page.title: 16MY HOME LIFE AT WEEKENDS
page.content: On Saturday, the family wake up a little later than the rest of the week when we have to go to work or school. During breakfast, I usually watch the children's programmes on television, while my brother plays computer games. Most Saturdays we go to town as a family to buy food from the Asda Supermarket which has been open for a few years and where, as our survey showed, many Hartpury people buy their groceries. Then we usually buy clothes and other items from the Shopping Centre. When we arrive home we play in the garden while dad tends to the gardening. In the afternoon, we travel by car to places of interest in the Forest of Dean or the Cotswolds. We spend our evenings watching television or reading books.
